titleStmt.title: Dǝrsāna sanbata krǝstiyān “Homily on the Sabbath of Christians”

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary:
I) Dәrsanä sanbata krǝstiyān “Homily on the Sabbath of Christians” (Homily on the observance of Sunday, ascribed to Jacob of Serug) (fols. 2ra – 35ra)
Additio 1.

msItem.title: I. Dǝrsāna sanbata krǝstiyān “Homily on the Sabbath of Christians” (Homily on the observance of Sunday, ascribed to Jaqob of Serug)
msItem.incipit: 2ra: በስመ፡ʼʼ… ድርሳን፡ ዘደረሰ፡ አባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘስሩግ፨ በእንተ፡ ቅድስት፡ ሰንበት፤ ክርስቲያን፤ ዘደረሰ፡ ርቱዓ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ አባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘስሩግ፨ ስምዑ፡ ኦፍቁራንየ፡ ውሉደ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ … 2ra: In the name of the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit, one God. (This is) the homily which ʾabbā Jaqob of Serug composed on St Sabbath of Christians, which ʾabbā James of Serug, Orthodox in faith, composed. Listen, my beloved ones, sons of the church …
msItem.explicit: 34vb (l.10) – 35ra (l.10): ... ወአድኅነነ፡ እምኵሉ፡ ምንዳቤ፡ ሥጋ፡ ወነፍስ፡ ወህየንተ፤ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፍ፤ ዘጸሐፈ፡ ወአጽሐፈ፤ እምሀከከ፤ ሰብእ፡ በጽላሎትከ፤ ወክድኖ፡ እምባህለ፡ ልሳን፡ በመንጦላእትከ፤ በም[35ra]ድር፡ ወበሰማያት፡ አጽንሐ፡ ዓስበ፡ ህየንተ፡ ፩፤ ፴፡ ፷፡ ወ፻፡ ወአድኅነነ፤ እምኵሉ፤ እኩይ፤ ዘበምድር፡ ወእምኵሉ፤ ኵነኔ፤ ዘበሰማያት፡ ለኵልነ፡ ደቂቀ፡ ዛቲ፤ መቅደስ፤ ውሉደ፡ ጥምቀት፤ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ ወአሜን፡ ለይኩን፨፨፨፨ 34vb (l.10): ... and save us from each plague of flesh and soul, and instead ... The one who wrote this book and let it be written, (protect) them from the troubles of people by your shade, and cover them from the (evel) words of the tongue by your curtains. In the Heaven and on the earth, prepare the reward 1, 30, 60, 100 (times more), and save us from each calamity on the earth and each judgment in the Heaven. For all of us, children of this sanctuary, sons of the Baptism. Forever and ever. Amen and amen. So be it.

note.p: The incipit is not quite clear; the text seems to have been corrupted.

supportDesc.extent:
Made of 36.0 folios, of which 3.0 blank 1rv, 35v, 36rv, in 6.0 quires .
190 160 30
supportDesc.condition: The sewing is damaged on the spine. 20, 28 and 36 are slightly damaged by rodents.

layout.ab: On average, the number of the lines to a folio is 17/18.
The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

list.item: Colon with short red lines above, below and in the middle (used throughout the text)
II. Four dot asterisk (e.g. fols.: 9rb, l.5; 15vb, l.13; 16va, l.2; 17va, l.14; 35rb, l.5);
nine dot asterisk (used throughout the text);
III. Chain of black and red left-pointing chevrons (esp. fol. 35ra, 11-12);

ff. 35ra, l.13- rb, 12: Additional personal names and invocation following the explicit. 35ra, l.13: ወለደቂቁ፡ ለኃብተ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ወለተ፡ ሥላሴ፡ መዝገበ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ወ[n.l.]። ዓመተ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ጽጌ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ተወልደ፡ መድኀን፡ ጸዋሬ፡ መስቀል፡ ማርቆስ፡ [35rb]ለመዝገበ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ብእሲ፡ ዓመተ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወለተ፡ ጻድቃን፡ ወለተ፡ ጊዮርጊስ። ወኢታጽርዑ፡ አንብቦታ፡ አንትሙ፡ ካሕናት፡ ወዲያቆናት፡ ከመ፡ ትርከቡ፡ ዓስበ፡ በመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ አሜን።
35ra, l.13: And for the children of Habta Śǝllāse, Walatta Śǝllāse Mazgaba Śǝllāse and ... ˤAmätä Śǝllāse, Ṣǝge Hāymānot, Tawalda Mädḫan, Ṣäware Masqal, Marqos; for Mazgaba Śǝllāse, his wife ˤAmätä Mikāʾel, Walatta Dāwit Ṣādǝqān, Walatta Giyorgis. And you, priests and deacons, don't be lazy at reading it so that you might find a reward in the Kingdom of Heaven. Amen.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards; two pairs of sewing stations.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

person.persName: Priest (qasis ) Habta Śǝllāse (mentioned throughout the Ms., esp. in Additio 1, 35ra, 13-14; cp. also 4ra, l.9; 4rb, ls. 9-10; 22vb, 13-14; 23ra, l.13; 23va, l.14; 31vb, l.17; 34vb, l.8). Walatta Śǝllāse (mentioned throughout the Ms., esp. in Additio 1, 35ra, l.14; cp. also 23ra, l.14; 23va, l.15; 32ra, l.1; 34vb, l.9). Some other names are mentioned in Additio 1: Mazgaba Śǝllāse, ˤAmätä Śǝllāse, Ṣǝge Hāymānot, Tawalda Madḫǝn, Ṣäware Masqal, Marqos, ˤAmätä Mikāʾel, Walatta Ṣādǝqān, Walatta Giyorgis.

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5
